explains: v. 宣布，公布；声称，郑重地说；（尤指通过广播）通知；播报，讲解（体育赛事）；通报……的到来；显示；告知；宣布竞选公职

sentences.en: They will announce the result of the vote tonight.
sentences.cn: 今晚他们将宣布投票结果。

sentences.en: He used the occasion to announce further tax cuts.
sentences.cn: 他利用这个机会宣布再次减税。

sentences.en: She was planning to announce her engagement to Peter.
sentences.cn: 她在计划宣布她与彼得的婚约。
